title: Dr. Subrahmanyam Jaishankar meets President Rajapaksa
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. Subrahmanyam Jaishankar called on President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Monday (28) morning.
During the meeting, President Rajapaksa had thanked India for the US $ 1 Bn Credit Line to Sri Lanka for the procurement of food, medicine, and other essentials.
Dr. Subrahmanyam Jaishankar is in Sri Lanka for the BIMSTEC summit in Colombo.
